As a result of frequent dishwashing, glassware can become permanently cloudy and dishware decorations and colours can fade permanently. This change in appearance is caused by corrosion of the glass and dish surfaces during the wash process. Your glasses and dishes need expert protection throughout the whole wash cycle. Finish Protector Dual Protection: Protects your glasses against corrosion, keeping the surfaces clear and shiny. With its unique decoration protection formula, protects the colour and brilliance of the decorations on your dishes to prevent fading. Remains active and provides protection for up to 50 washes. Finish Protector Dual Protection has a unique technology that releases special protection agents into the wash water, to neutralise the damaging corrosive elements in every wash. Finish Protector Dual Protection remains active for approx. 50 washing cycles. Increased washing temperatures, long running programs and very soft water inside the dishwasher are unfavourable for glasses and decorations. For optimal protection in such harsh conditions, an increased level of protective agents is necessary. The unique technology of Finish Protector Dual Protection adjusts for these conditions - the diamond dissolves faster and Finish Protector Dual Protection may need replacing before the full 50 cycles are completed. Glass-corrosion happens over time. Now that you have decided to protect your glasses against corrosion, try using protector as it helps protect against visible glass corrosion for longer than detergent alone. Antique, handpainted and gold coloured tableware is not suited to the high temperatures inside dishwashers, therefore these items may become damaged even if Finish Protector Dual Protection is used. Heat is the original 'must-have' celebrity weekly, delivering a trusted premium celebrity magazine week in week out, inventing language that has been taken and is now common place in media and youth culture. It has defined a generation and is the only authoritative magazine on celebrities that celebrities themselves actually read! Heat's unrivalled.

Country Living is for anyone whose heart is in the country. It offers a unique lifestyle package, mixing homes and decorating with food and farming; crafts and gardening with fashion, health and beauty.

Perfect for anyone fascinated by the world around them regardless of their level of knowledge or qualification. Bringing news from the world of science, covering physics, biology, chemistry, quantum mechanics and string theory. Covering technology, application, theory and featuring new research and thought-provoking opinion pieces.

Dedicated to the very best things in life, Red is a magazine that women have an enormous emotional connection with. Red brings brilliant writing and sumptuous visuals with an injection of wit, news making feature coups, star-power and glorious fashion that is both aspirational and accessible.

World renowned and highly regarded, The Economist is an authoritative and leading voice in the world of economics and finance. For a weekly magazine it covers a huge amount of content from across the world, featuring coverage of finance, economic and monetary concerns with focused reporting.

This is the perfect magazine for people who love to make top quality British food, with plenty of quick and tasty recipes using only the freshest seasonal ingredients. Designed to work around your busy lifestyle, Delicious brings you plenty of tasty quick meals to elaborate dishes.

Launched in 1919, Homes & Gardens is Britain's oldest decorating magazine. Aspirational yet accessible, stylish, sophisticated and indulgent, Homes & Gardens showcases classic design that stands the test of time.
